RedistributorWorkServer
public class BatchWorkServer
extends AbstractBatchWorkServer

A job for serving work to other jobs across a cluster.

Author:
Spence Koehler

buildOutputFilename

protected final java.lang.String buildOutputFilename()
Description copied from class: WorkServer
Build the output filename for this work server's log.

Extenders may override. Default is to use the work server's class name and jobId through the config's output data path.

Overrides:
buildOutputFilename in class WorkServer
